cause.description:
Relief International (RI) is an international non-governmental relief-to-development and educational services organization. It is a partner of the United Nations in responding to disasters and complex humanitarian emergencies and is also registered with USAID as a 501(c)3 not-for-profit organization which assists victims in relief and disaster situations.
1. Darfur Relief
2. From Relief to Recovery Globally
3. Restoring Women's Livelihoods and Dignity
cause.mission: Promote development in response to the humanitarian crisis in Darfur and elsewhere
cause.name: Darfur Relief
